AA.description: ADD QUANTITY TO MAKE MINIMUM WEIGHT REQUIREMENT

AB.description: NOTIFY PRIOR TO SHIPMENT IF QUANTITY SPECIFIED IS NOT AVAILABLE

B.description: BACK ORDER ONLY IF NEW ITEM

BC.description: RESTRICTED TO HISTORICALLY BLACK COLLEGE OR UNIVERSITY OR MINORIT

IP.description: RESTRICTED TO INDUSTRIAL PREPAREDNESS PROGRAM PARTICIPANTS

K.description: SMALL PURCHASE SET ASIDE FOR SMALL BUSINESSES

O.description: BACK ORDER IF ITEMS ARE OUT OF STOCK OR NOT YET PUBLISHED

P.description: LARGE PURCHASE, SET-ASIDE FOR SMALL BUSINESS

QE.description: EXCLUDE IMPORT QUOTA IN FIRST COST

QI.description: INCLUDE IMPORT QUOTA IN FIRST COST

QP.description: RESTRICTED TO QUALIFIED PRODUCTS LIST (QPL) PRODUCTS

R.description: COMBINED SMALL, DISADVANTAGED BUSINESS AND LABOR SURPLUS AREA SET

S.description: PARTIAL LABOR SURPLUS AREA SET ASIDE

SG.description: SMALL REMAINING BALANCE CANCELLATION NOT ALLOWED

SQ.description: SHIP PARTIAL, ITEM QTY PROPORTIONAL TO TOTAL ORDER

SW.description: SHIP PER RELEASE OR BUYER AUTHORIZATION

T.description: SMALL BUSINESS WITH SMALL, DISADVANTAGED BUSINESS CONSIDERATION S

UC.description: RESTRICTED TO U.S. AND CANADIAN SOURCES

Y.description: BACK ORDER IF OUT OF STOCK
